name: initialize_user
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーごとの ReferralAccount を初回のみ初期化"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . referral ;
acct . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: refer_user
attributes: # [doc = " 紹介者(referrer) が新規ユーザー(referee)を紹介して報酬を獲得"]
body: let referrer = & mut ctx . accounts . referrer ;
let referee = & mut ctx . accounts . referee ;
msg ! ("Referrer {:?}: referrals={}, rewards={}" , referrer . owner , referrer . referrals , referrer . rewards) ;
msg ! ("Referee  {:?}: rewards={}" , referee . owner , referee . rewards) ;

name: view_referral
attributes: # [doc = " 自分の紹介情報をログ出力"]
body: msg ! ("User {:?}: referrals={}, rewards={}" , acct . owner , acct . referrals , acct . rewards) ;

fields.name: referral
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 初回のみ PDA を init"] # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"ref" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: referrer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 紹介者アカウント"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"ref" , referrer . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: referee
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 被紹介者アカウント"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"ref" , referee . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 紹介者自身が署名"] # [account (address = referrer . owner , has_one = owner)]

fields.name: referral
fields.attribute: # [account (seeds = [b"ref" , user . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , has_one = owner)]
